messages.message: I know we can’t support default drives for google drive, and maybe I’m going about this the wrong way, but the current flow for adding a google drive (where I have to navigate to the file uploader) seems counter-intuitive to me. Is it possible to still support this in the Drives section of the settings with information to the user that this can’t be set as the default?
The drives page is only for admins to add an org drive (makes available in every workspace). you can add a drive to a workspace directly by going to the workspace and pressing data sources.
ah okay! that makes a lot of sense, thanks for the clarification!
